task.summary: Added TextView option for inputs. Gradle update. Code clean up.
Added title hiding option and ability to override padding and background of inputs. Updated Readme.
Added default options for attributes to prevent AS render problems. Updated TextView option to include text appearance changes Updated Readme.
Added attributes for overriding TextView input type. Updated Readme.
Added attributes to customise text colors. Updated Readme.
Fix for customised text colors. Updated Readme.
Fix for customised text colors. Updated Readme.
Update for input/title text colours. Updated Readme.
Fix for parity between side on xl screens. Updated Readme.
Fix to force input view to match_parent with height when title hidden. Updated Readme.
Fix for centre margins. Updated Readme.
